title: Home
content: After years of creating delicious homemade gluten-free and dairy-free chocolate covered cherries, Esther and her mom Kate, were asked if they would be willing to sell their desserts.  Having struggled to find great tasting and reasonably priced gluten-free and dairy-free goodies for Christmas and special occasions, the mother-daughter duo decided it was time to provide their goodies to the gluten-free and dairy free community and beyond. Therefore, _Grammy's Gluten Free Goodies_ began!
